## Three Words About the SDGs

:::{.cr-section layout="overlay-center"}

**"Name three words when you think about the SDGs."** @cr-words

**Future**, **Hope**, and **Action** dominated. @cr-words

**Together**, **Planet**, and **Change** --- a shared journey toward transformation. @cr-words

**Innovation** and **Community** --- solutions from collective creativity. @cr-words

:::{#cr-words}
```{python}
#| echo: false
colors_cloud = ["#38bdf8","#f472b6","#a78bfa","#34d399","#fbbf24","#818cf8",
                "#22d3ee","#fb923c","#86efac","#f472b6","#38bdf8","#fbbf24",
                "#a78bfa","#34d399","#818cf8","#22d3ee","#f87171","#c084fc",
                "#86efac","#fb923c","#67e8f9","#fbbf24","#f472b6","#38bdf8",
                "#34d399","#a78bfa","#818cf8","#fbbf24","#22d3ee","#f87171"]

fig = go.Figure()
max_m = max(m for _, m in words_data)
min_m = min(m for _, m in words_data)

for i, (word, mentions) in enumerate(words_data):
    angle = i * 0.75
    radius = 0.5 + i * 0.35
    frac = (mentions - min_m) / (max_m - min_m)
    fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(
        x=[radius * math.cos(angle)],
        y=[radius * math.sin(angle) * 0.7],
        mode="text", text=[word],
        textfont=dict(size=10 + frac * 24, color=colors_cloud[i % len(colors_cloud)]),
        hovertemplate=f"{word}: {mentions} mentions<extra></extra>",
        showlegend=False,
    ))

fig.update_layout(title="Words Sized by Frequency",
                  xaxis=dict(visible=False), yaxis=dict(visible=False, scaleanchor="x"))
fig.show()
```
:::
